statements: SELECT * FROM FinancialTransactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_type, amount FROM FinancialTransactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp ASC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount FROM FinancialTransactions WHERE customer_id = 200 AND fraud_flag = true
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM FinancialTransactions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM FinancialTransactions WHERE transaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31'
SELECT * FROM FinancialTransactions ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount FROM FinancialTransactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM FinancialTransactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM FinancialTransactions WHERE customer_id = 123 AND fraud_flag = TRUE ORDER BY transaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, customer_id FROM FinancialTransactions WHERE transaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, category FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_id, category FROM financial_transactions WHERE category LIKE 'Food%';
SELECT * FROM anomalies ORDER BY detection_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount, category FROM financial_transactions WHERE category='Utilities' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, a.anomaly_description FROM financial_transactions t JOIN anomalies a ON t.transaction_id = a.transaction_id WHERE a.detection_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY t.amount ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT AVG(amount), category FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY category ORDER BY AVG(amount) DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE fraud_flag = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT merchant_name, category FROM merchant_details ORDER BY merchant_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customer_details WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' AND customer_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE fraud_flag = true;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';

SELECT customer_name, merchant_name, transaction_amount FROM customer_details JOIN financial_transactions ON customer_details.customer_id = financial_transactions.customer_id JOIN merchant_details ON financial_transactions.merchant_id = merchant_details.merchant_id;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date, merchant_name, customer_id FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date='2021-10-15';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT detection_id, transaction_id, fraud_score, detection_date, fraud_type FROM fraud_detection WHERE fraud_score > 0.8;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT anomaly_id, transaction_id, anomaly_description FROM anomalies
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, merchant_name FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, fraud_score, fraud_type FROM fraud_detection WHERE fraud_score > 0.5 AND fraud_type = 'Chargeback' ORDER BY detection_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT transaction_id, anomaly_description FROM anomalies WHERE detection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT anomaly_description, detection_date FROM anomalies ORDER BY detection_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT report_id, report_name, data_range_start, data_range_end FROM business_intelligence WHERE data_range_start >= '2022-01-01' AND data_range_end <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1001
SELECT ft.transaction_id, ft.customer_id, c.customer_name, ft.amount FROM financial_transactions ft JOIN customers c ON ft.customer_id = c.customer_id
SELECT fd.transaction_id, fd.fraud_score, a.anomaly_description FROM fraud_detection fd LEFT JOIN anomalies a ON fd.transaction_id = a.transaction_id WHERE fd.fraud_score > 0.8
SELECT bi.*, ft.amount FROM business_intelligence bi JOIN financial_transactions ft ON ft.transaction_date BETWEEN bi.data_range_start AND bi.data_range_end
